\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* weight \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w out|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Baalberith: wherewith \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w himself|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0310"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* needy, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* vagabonds, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.
